title: Île-d'Aix
summary: Île-d'Aix (pronounced [il dɛks]) is a commune and an island in the Charente-Maritime department, region of New Aquitaine (formerly Poitou-Charentes), off the west coast of France. It occupies the territory of the small Isle of Aix (île d'Aix), in the Atlantic Ocean. It is a popular place for tourist day-trips during the summer months.
